seng202.crimeSpy.crimeData

Interface DAL_able


  • public interface DAL_able
    DATA ACCESS LAYER Interface

    This interface is intended to be used by any persistent storage functions.

    Any interaction (reading/writing/editing) with persistent storage (DB, file, XML...) should be done with the function naming defined within this interface.
    Notes
    • The creation of the persistent storage location/container is left to the instantiating object (eg: FileManager will create a .csv, DBManager will create a DB).
    • The conversion of the persistent storage media data to object data and vice versa is also not covered by this interface.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void editCrimeRecord()
      Read a single crime record from persistent storage and return an equivalent CrimeRecord object
      void editCrimeRecords()
      Read a collection of crime records from persistent storage and return an equivalent CrimeCollection object consisting of CrimeRecord objects
      CrimeRecord readCrimeRecord(java.lang.String crimeID)
      Read a single crime record from persistent storage and return an equivalent CrimeRecord object
      CrimeCollection readCrimeRecords()
      Read a collection of crime records from persistent storage and return an equivalent CrimeCollection object consisting of CrimeRecord objects
      void writeCrimeRecord(CrimeRecord crime)
      Write a single block of crime record data to persistent storage.
      void writeCrimeRecords(CrimeCollection crimes)
      Write a collection of crime data to persistent storage.

    • Method Detail

      • writeCrimeRecord

        void writeCrimeRecord(CrimeRecord crime)
        Write a single block of crime record data to persistent storage. This method expects a CrimeRecord object.
        Parameters:
        crime - is a CrimeCollection object

      • writeCrimeRecords

        void writeCrimeRecords(CrimeCollection crimes)
        Write a collection of crime data to persistent storage. This method expects a CrimeCollection (collection object of CrimeRecords)
        Parameters:
        crimes - is a CrimeCollection object

      • readCrimeRecord

        CrimeRecord readCrimeRecord(java.lang.String crimeID)
        Read a single crime record from persistent storage and return an equivalent CrimeRecord object
        Parameters:
        crimeID - A CrimeRecord ID
        Returns:
        a CrimeRecord object

      • readCrimeRecords

        CrimeCollection readCrimeRecords()
        Read a collection of crime records from persistent storage and return an equivalent CrimeCollection object consisting of CrimeRecord objects
        Returns:
        a CrimeRecord object

      • editCrimeRecord

        void editCrimeRecord()
        Read a single crime record from persistent storage and return an equivalent CrimeRecord object

      • editCrimeRecords

        void editCrimeRecords()
        Read a collection of crime records from persistent storage and return an equivalent CrimeCollection object consisting of CrimeRecord objects
